defaultConstructor.summary: Create an instance with default initialization.

method.name: ToString
method.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
method.returns: A string that represents the current object.

method.name: ToString
method.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object with the specified format string.

method.name: GetHashCode
method.summary: Serves as the default hash function.

method.name: Equals
method.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
method.param: The object to compare with the current object.
method.returns: if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, .

method.name: Equals
method.summary: Determine whether the current instance contains the same information with hat from the specified parameter.

operator.name: op_Equality
operator.summary: Indicates whether two instances have a same value.

operator.name: op_Inequality
operator.summary: Indicates whether two instances have two different values.
